entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v3.6
entry.content:
Version 3.6 of HortusFox

Changelog - Fixed overlapping photo on certain screen widths in plant details view - Fixed that 'ID' and 'Location' are included when editing an inventory item - Fixed that apostrophes render inventory groups uneditable - Fixed width of inventory group table action column

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v3.7
entry.content:
Version 3.7 of HortusFox

Changelog

  • Plant recognition using Pl@ntNet API
  • Switch between card and list view in location views
  • Toggle features such as tasks, inventory or calendar
  • Improve management of inventory group items
  • Embed custom code in the HTML head section
  • Increase memory_limit to avoid getting out of memory for photo processing
  • Bulk saving for users, locations, attributes and calendar in admin section
  • Select current date on date prompts for plant attributes

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v3.8
entry.content:
Version 3.8 of HortusFox

Changelog - Plant recognition: Choose from returned list - Daylight Saving Time for weather feature - Fix weather data not saving with mariadb strict mode - Manage quantity via inventory editing - Fix redundant scrollbars on Chrome Desktop - Sorting & filter for list view - Turn chat input into a textarea - Hide tasks/inventory in bottom navbar if not activated

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v3.9
entry.content:
Version 3.9 of HortusFox

  • Fixed that ghost items of shared photos could not be deleted
  • Fixed that camera selection was not working via plant recognition upload on mobile devices
  • Account for several time zones for weather map feature
  • Move plant preview photo to gallery when submitting new photo
  • Option to remove a plant preview photo without replacing it

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v4.0
entry.content:
Version 4.0 of HortusFox

Changelog

  • Retain plant picture when replacing (#312)
  • Inventory exports to PDF/JSON/CSV (#305)
  • Added norwegian translation (#322)
  • Upgraded to FontAwesome v6 (#320)
  • Tagging for inventory items (#319)
  • Added API endpoint for adding plants
  • Purify HTML code in chat
  • Fixed that editing tasks will include task ID (#331)
  • Updated spanish translation
  • Upgraded underlying framework
  • Updated npm dependencies
  • GBif query basis (beta)
  • Various improvements and bugfixes
